code: import axios from'axios';var api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:3000/api'});export var insertMovie=function insertMovie(payload){return api.post("/movie",payload);};export var getAllMovies=function getAllMovies(){return api.get("/movies");};export var updateMovieById=function updateMovieById(id,payload){return api.put("/movie/".concat(id),payload);};export var deleteMovieById=function deleteMovieById(id){return api.delete("/movie/".concat(id));};export var getMovieById=function getMovieById(id){return api.get("/movie/".concat(id));};var apis={insertMovie:insertMovie,getAllMovies:getAllMovies,updateMovieById:updateMovieById,deleteMovieById:deleteMovieById,getMovieById:getMovieById};export default apis;
